snippet: David Sweat pleaded guilty to three felony counts stemming from the carefully planned escape from Clinton Correctional Facility that he and a fellow inmate, Richard W. Matt, staged in June.
abstract: David Sweat, convicted killer who staged successful breakout from Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora, NY, in June, along with inmate Richard Matt, pleads guilty to felony criminal charges stemming from breakout.
lead_paragraph: David Sweat pleaded guilty to three felony counts stemming from the carefully planned escape from Clinton Correctional Facility that he and a fellow inmate, Richard W. Matt, staged in June.

headline.main: David Sweat, Ex-Escapee, Pleads Guilty to Charges in Prison Breakout
headline.print_headline: Convicted Killer Pleads Guilty to Charges in Prison Break
